content: tiny hibiscus flower crochet pattern materials tiny bit of caron simply soft brights in lemonade tiny bit of caron simply soft autumn red 3 25mm crochet hook flower using the yellow yarn 1 5 single_crochet into magic_ring and join with a slip_stitch to first single_crochet leave a long tail for sewing 2 chain 1 3sc into each single_crochet around join with a slip_stitch to first single_crochet makes the base of 5 petals 3 chain 1 single_crochet in next st 3 double_crochet in next st single_crochet in next st x5 join with a slip_stitch to first single_crochet 5 slip_stitch all the way around join with a slip_stitch to first slip_stitch and tie off stamen using the red yarn 1 leave a long tail for sewing and chain 6 2 3 single_crochet in second chain from hook 3 slip_stitch in next 4 stitches tie off joining thread the long red tail through the center of the yellow flower and tie a knot on the other side of the flower to hold it in place use the yellow and red tails left for sewing to attach the flower to whatever you wish this pattern is copyright by nichole verville swingkitty007 s livejournal as of october 2008 please do not use this pattern without crediting me for the pattern do not sell this pattern you can sell the finished product if you wish but you must credit me for the pattern
